sentences.en: For referral or check details, pls. contact Shirley Naturopathic Holistic Centre.

sentences.en: In so far as historicism is technological, its approach is not piecemeal, but'holistic '.
sentences.cn: 仅就历史决定论是一种技术而论, 它的方法不是渐进的, 而是 “ 整体主义的 ”.

sentences.en: Methods 56 cases of rectal carcinoma underwent the same holistic nursing perioperatively.

sentences.en: More importantly, it a major symbol to the holistic educational approach.
sentences.cn: 更重要的是, 它配合全人发展的教育方针.

sentences.en: RIGHT brained people tend to be subjective, creative, intuitive and holistic.

sentences.en: So, as I said to you, natural medicine is also known as holistic medicine.
sentences.cn: 那么，正如我对你说过的那样，自然医学也被称为整体医学。

sentences.en: There is a fundamental ambiguity in the use of word'whole'in recent holistic literature.
sentences.cn: 在近代的整体主义著作中, “ 整体 ” 这个词的用法极其含混.

sentences.en: This holistic philosophy of car making has a long tradition at Ford.
sentences.cn: 这个制造汽车的整体理念是福特公司由来已久的传统.

sentences.en: This principle plays on the holistic nature of systems.
sentences.cn: 这个原理利用的是系统的整体性.

sentences.en: Understanding this means at the region from a holistic, ecological standpoint.
sentences.cn: 要明白这点就意味着我们需要从全局和生态学的观点来看待这一地区.

sentences.en: We need to take a holistic approach to this issue.
sentences.cn: 这就是我们辩证地看待财政赤字的问题.

trans.tran_en: considering a person or thing as a whole, rather than as separate parts
